WorkItem.ClosedComment: Each model listed has been fixed. If more are found to be on the old method we can investigate then
WorkItem.Description:
Retribution model has hardcoded StatConversion.NPC_LEVEL_CRIT_MOD[targetLevel - 80] being used ie: level 80 instead of character.level [Fixed]
 
DPSDK model has hardcoded 3 level difference and ignores BossHandler & player level. [Fixed]
 
ProtPally model is slightly better but has still hardcoded level 85 rather than character.level [Fixed]
 
Enhance model [Fixed] and probably lots of others doesn't even use StatConversion.NPC_LEVEL_CRIT_MOD and instead hard codes the reduction.

Comments.Message: Yeah, I know DPSDK isn't doin' anything w/ the Bosshandler stuff yet.  DPSDK focus is getting the rotation stuff cleaned up, and TankDK is using the Bosshandler since it has a broader scope.  I'll be getting this fixed in the next week or so.
